item.title: Angela add a quote by Catherine Drinker Bowen
item.description: "Writing, I think, is not apart from living. Writing is a kind of double living. The writer experiences everything twice. Once in reality and once in that mirror which waits always before or behind." -- Catherine Drinker Bowen

item.title: Angela add a quote by Sinclair Lewis
item.description: "It is impossible to discourage the real writers - they don't give a damn what you say, they're going to write." -- Sinclair Lewis

item.title: Angela add a quote by Melinda Haynes
item.description: "Forget all the rules. Forget about being published. Write for yourself and celebrate writing." -- Melinda Haynes

item.title: Angela add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Angela add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Angela add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Angela add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Angela add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: Angela add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West

item.title: Angela add a quote by Apple Computer Inc.
item.description: "Here's to the crazy ones. The misfits. The rebels. The troublemakers. The round pegs in the square holes. The ones who see things differently. They're not fond of rules. And they have no respect for the status quo. You can quote them, disagree with them, glorify or vilify them. About the only thing you can't do is ignore them. Because they change things. They push the human race forward. And while some may see them as the crazy ones, we see genius. Because the people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones who do." -- Apple Computer Inc.

item.title: Angela add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I am enough of an artist to draw freely upon my imagination. Imagination is more important than knowledge. Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Angela add a quote by Bessie Anderson Stanley
Angela add a quote by Richard Wright
item.description: "I would hurl words into this darkness and wait for an echo, and if an echo sounded, no matter how faintly, I would send other words to tell, to march, to fight, to create a sense of the hunger for life that gnaws in us all." -- Richard Wright

item.title: Angela add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "There is no greater agony than bearing an untold story inside you." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Angela add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "I've learned that you can tell a lot about a person by the way (s)he handles these three things: a rainy day, lost luggage, and tangled Christmas tree lights." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Angela add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "You can only become truly accomplished at something you love. Don’t make money your goal. Instead pursue the things you love doing and then do them so well that people can’t take their eyes off of you." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Angela add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "Each person deserves a day away in which no problems are confronted, no solutions searched for." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Angela add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "Words mean more than what is set down on paper. It takes the human voice to infuse them with shades of deeper meaning." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Angela add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "Stepping onto a brand-new path is difficult, but not more difficult than remaining in a situation, which is not nurturing to the whole woman." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Angela add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "Pretty women wonder where my secret lies. I'm not cute or built to suit a fashion model's size But when I start to tell them, They think I'm telling lies. I say, It's in the reach of my arms The span of my hips, The stride of my step, The curl of my lips. I'm a woman Phenomenally. Phenomenal woman, That's me." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Angela add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "Between two evils, I always pick the one I never tried before." -- Mae West

item.title: Angela add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "I generally avoid temptation unless I can't resist it." -- Mae West

item.title: Angela add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "I wrote the story myself. It's about a girl who lost her reputation and never missed it." -- Mae West

item.title: Angela add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "When I'm good, I'm very good, but when I'm bad, I'm better. " -- Mae West

item.title: Angela add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "Sex is an emotion in motion." -- Mae West

item.title: Angela add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "Those who are easily shocked should be shocked more often." -- Mae West

item.title: Angela add a quote by Dean Koontz
item.description: "At the core of every ordered system, whether a family or a factory, is chaos. But in the whirl of every chaos lies a strange order, waiting to be found." -- Dean Koontz

item.title: Angela add a quote by Dean Koontz
item.description: "To many people, free will is a license to rebel not against what is unjust or hard in life but against what is best for them and true." -- Dean Koontz

item.title: Angela add a quote by Dean Koontz
item.description: "The geometry of judgment is a circle. Hate is a snake that turns to consume itself from the tail, a circle that diminishes to a point, then to nothing. Pride is such a snake, and envy, and greed. Love, however, is a hoop, a wheel, that rolls on forever. We are rescued by those whom we have rescued. The saved become the saviors of their saviors." -- Dean Koontz

item.title: Angela add a quote by Dean Koontz
item.description: "Guilt is a tireless horse. Grief ages into sorrow, and sorrow is an enduring rider." -- Dean Koontz
